### Description
This ticket covers conducting the research sessions for the [study name] study. The study focuses on [brief description of study]. The study will include:
- X or more participants
- Y-minute remote sessions

#### Timeframe for this ticket
This phase typically lasts 1-2 weeks. Depending on the number of sessions and the scheduling, it may fall over two different sprints. In that case: 
- Duplicate this ticket using the link at the bottom right of the screen
- Name the tickets ‚ÄúConduct research sessions, part 1‚Äù and ‚ÄúConduct research sessions, part 2‚Äù

### Tasks
**Before each session:**
- [ ] 10-15 minutes before session starts, start a thread in the #feedback-backchannel in Slack. Tag the notetaker and observers in the message, and list the participant number. Alternatively, messages can be scheduled in advance - just remember to unschedule them if the session is cancelled.

   The message should say something like:\
   `P4 - Disability Benefits study starts in 9 minutes! Please use this thread for questions and comments üßµ  @[notetaker] @[observer1] @[observer2]`
- [ ] Notetaker should make sure they have a note-taking doc ready for the session

**During sessions:**
- [ ] If possible, moderator and notetaker should join the session about 5-10 minutes before the scheduled start time, because Veterans sometimes arrive early
- [ ] Follow Perigean guidance regarding no-shows or latecomers

**After each session or daily**
- [ ] Moderator, notetaker, and observers meet to discuss sessions, note highlights in Mural

### Optional task
- [ ] Do follow-up [after-session cleanup tasks](https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/va.gov-team/blob/master/.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/%5BDBC%20Research%20Ticket%20Template%20Kit%20-%2015%5D%20After-session%20cleanup.md) while conducting sessions

### Acceptance criteria
- [ ] Sessions have been conducted
- [ ] Recordings and transcripts are downloaded from Zoom and saved in the appropriate location
- [ ] Notes are saved in the appropriate location
